department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
duration_in_months: There is no information about the duration of the contract.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Portable Chlorophyll Fluorometer Acquisition

**Reference Number**: WS3705541227-Doc3761317959
**Publication Date**: January 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: February 1, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Type**
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Procurement Category**
 Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method**
 Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Trade Agreements**
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

** regionsOfDelivery**
This contract will be delivered in Quebec, Quebec, Canada.

**Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
* Martineau, Francois S (SPAC/PSPC)
* francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15142995?extsite=MTUxNDI5OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Description**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada is inviting bids for the acquisition of a set of 3 portable chlorophyll fluorometers with accessories. The tender closing date is February 1, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bid submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. The contract is subject to the trade agreements mentioned above and will be delivered in Quebec, Quebec, Canada. All supporting documentation must be submitted by the tender closing date.

**End User Entities**
* Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* Department of National Defence (DND)

**Regions of Opportunity**
None specified.

**Summary**
This tender is for the acquisition of 3 portable chlorophyll fluorometers with accessories. The contract will be awarded under the CCFTA and CKFTA trade agreements and will be delivered in Quebec, Quebec, Canada. The tender closing date is February 1, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bid submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
